value: Aapko images.py se IMAGES import kar kar, woh images print karni hai. Jab bhi user koi galat input deta hai, toh aap corresponding image dikhayenge.
Toh agar user ne teesri baar galat answer diya, toh aap teesri wali image dikhayeing, remaining_lives ko graphically show karne ke liye.
